statements: UPDATE golf_courses SET location = 'New York' WHERE course_id = 1;
UPDATE golf_courses SET course_name = 'Sunrise Golf Club', course_layout = 'Beautiful scenery with challenging holes' WHERE course_id = 2;
UPDATE golf_courses SET location = 'New Location', course_name = 'Updated Course' WHERE course_id = 1;
UPDATE golf_courses SET course_name = 'Renovated Course', course_layout = 'New course layout' WHERE location = 'Hillside';
UPDATE golf_courses SET location = 'Florida', number_of_holes = 18 WHERE course_id = 1;
UPDATE course_layouts SET par = 3, length = 400 WHERE layout_id = 2;
UPDATE golf_courses SET location = 'California' WHERE course_id = 1;
UPDATE course_layouts SET length = 400, par = 4 WHERE course_id = 1 AND hole_number = 5;
UPDATE golf_courses SET location='New Location', course_name='Updated Course Name' WHERE course_id=1
UPDATE course_details SET difficulty='Advanced', par=72, yardage=7000 WHERE course_id=2
UPDATE golf_courses SET location = 'California', course_name = 'Pebble Beach Golf Links' WHERE course_id = 1;
UPDATE course_details SET par = 72, yardage = 7200 WHERE course_id = 1;
UPDATE golf_courses SET location = 'New Location', name = 'Updated Name' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE golf_courses_schedule SET start_time = '09:00:00', end_time = '14:00:00' WHERE schedule_id = 2;
UPDATE golf_courses SET location='New Location', course_layout='Updated Layout' WHERE id=1;
UPDATE tournament_results SET score=75,position=3 WHERE player_id=101 AND tournament_id IN (SELECT schedule_id FROM golf_courses_schedule WHERE course_id=1);
UPDATE golf_courses SET location = 'New Location' WHERE course_id = 1;
UPDATE holes SET yardage = 350 WHERE hole_id = 3;
UPDATE golf_courses SET location = 'Florida' WHERE course_id = 1;
UPDATE course_layouts SET par = 72, hole_number = 18 WHERE layout_id = 2;
